title: Development Process of a Structured Mathematics Learning Design Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of mathematics pedagogy and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service and in-service teachers to develop competencies in designing structured learning activities for mathematics, with collaborative learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design a structured learning activity sequence of three or more levels within the mathematics curriculum.
Learners can visualize and present PBL-based mathematics learning scenarios using digital tools.
Learners can revise and enhance a learning design framework by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
